name: iMindQ
short_description: iMindQ™ is a premier mind mapping software solution, developed by the company Seavus. Over the years, the application has established a large user base consisted of individual, professional, business, governmental, non-governmental and academic users. Around 200.000 active users have included iMindQ mind maps in their everyday activities and business challenges in order to stimulate thinking, innovate, organize and visually present ideas, and solve problems more efficiently. As an iMindQ™ user you get to experience an intuitive Multiplatform and Multilanguage solution that inspires creativity, stimulates brainstorming and provides a unique approach to visualize and present information in order to see the big picture. In iMindQ™ you can record your thoughts and ideas in various types of formats, such as mind maps, concept maps, diagrams, flowcharts etc. or use it as a virtual white board. iMindQ™ is available for Windows, Mac, web and iOS user platforms.
summary: iMindQ - new premier mind mapping solution.
